name: rgho
tagline: Access WHO Global Health Observatory Data From R
body: # rgho - Access WHO Global Health Observatory Data From R `rgho` is an `R` package to access [WHO GHO data](http://www.who.int/gho/database/en/) from `R` via the Athena web service, an API providing a simple query interface to the World Health Organization's data and statistics content. You can install: * the latest released version from CRAN with: ```r install.packages("rgho") ``` * the latest development version from github with: ```r devtools::install_github("pierucci/rgho@devel") ``` ## Main features * List available dimensions and codes with `get_gho_dimensions()` and `get_gho_codes()`. * Download data with `get_gho_data()`. ## Documentation * [Introduction](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgho/vignettes/a-intro.html). * [List of GHO dimensions](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgho/vignettes/b-dimensions.html). * [List of codes for the `GHO` dimension](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgho/vignettes/c-codes-gho.html). * [List of codes for the `COUNTRY` dimension](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgho/vignettes/d-codes-country.html). * [Details about how requests are performed](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/rgho/vignettes/e-details.html). ## Dev [Antoine FilipoviÄ‡-Pierucci](https://pierucci.github.io/).
